welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Khandsa, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and experience all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, mainly used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Indira Gandhi International Airport, used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available for up to 45 minutes per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
